Title: In Wait, A Serenade

Threading hope through the hum of tax helplines swirled,
Rustling patience in the queue, for justice is unfurled.
Unseen voices weather, 'neath the trial's hourly chime,
Yet in dense fog of waiting, blooms the resilience of time.
prompt: Queue time for UK tax helplines now worse than in pandemic Call waiting times for the government’s tax helplines are worse than during the pandemic, with HM Revenue and Customs now restricting access for millions of taxpayers. Accountants warn that callers face waits of up to an hour to get through, while some people have reported being cut off before a call is even answered.
